title: Prinova is Proud to Be a Sponsor of Canon’s First Annual thINK Conference
text: Prinova is Proud to Be a Sponsor of Canon’s First Annual thINK Conference (9/1/2015) September 1, 2015 Toronto, ON— Prinova Inc., a leader in developing and delivering innovative software and services within the Customer   (CCM) market, announced today it will be a sponsor and active participant in Canon Solutions America’s inaugural digital and inkjet printing event, thINK. The 2015 thINK conference is a natural outgrowth of the advisory groups Canon Solutions America has sponsored over the past few years. The event, to be held September 8-10, 2015 in New York, NY at Canon Expo, is exclusively for Canon Solutions America production print customers and partners/sponsors. The conference is expected to attract more than 300 of the leading inkjet service providers . Prinova will demonstrate its versatile Messagepoint software during the conference. Visitors to Booth #5 will be able to observe how Messagepoint can help maximize investments made in high-speed color inkjet printing systems by giving business users control over the entire messaging lifecycle for print communications independent of IT. Messagepoint is a hybrid-cloud CCM solution unlike any other, in that it works seamlessly with existing composition and delivery tools to create, test and execute targeted, personalized   from a centralized location. “We are looking forward to playing an active role in this conference and showing participants the many benefits gained by using Messagepoint in conjunction with high speed Inkjet technology. By giving business users an easy to use platform to simplify the creation and management of personalized communications, Messagepoint customers are able to create more effective campaigns, leading to improved customer experiences.” said Nick Romano, CEO of Prinova. About Prinova Prinova Inc. is a leader in developing and delivering innovative software and services within the Customer   market. Prinova Services delivers award-winning designs, and gets them into production seamlessly while providing the support our clients need to effectively maintain their communications. Prinova’s Messagepoint solution helps companies strengthen   by enabling business users to control the entire messaging lifecycle for all print or digital communications without burdening IT.   visit http://www.prinova.com/ .
